name: Deadly Dungeon Rewind
description: My Entry for the Brackeys 2020 Game Jam! A rougelike top-down shooter where all weapons fire in reverse. Apologies in advance for the tons of bugs and clunkiness you will almost surely see, this is my first attempt ever at making a full game.  :/ Also, I couldn't figure out how to get the game to scale properly so pleas play in fullscreen!
